overview:
Irina Charnaia is a Co-Founder and Chief Creative Officer of triMirror and is a serial e-commerce entrepreneur.

Prior to triMirror, Irina built and operated a highly popular social networking website from 1999 until its successful sale and exit in 2007. It provided discussion forums, price comparison, educational tutorials and articles, various creative tools, and reviews. By consulting the targeted industry in internet communication and advertising that allows the vendor to participate in its customerâ€™s shopping experience by providing honest advice, knowledge, and support, the company provided a new way for businesses to approach internet advertising in a revolutionary way.

She holds a Masters in Material Science of Semiconductors from the Moscow Institute of Steel and Alloys and her professional background is in electronic technology engineering.

degrees.subject: Semiconductor Materials & Devices
degrees.institution: Moscow Institute of Steel and Alloys (Technological University)
